text: "Morning Glory" is a song by the rock band Oasis. The song was written by Noel Gallagher, and which was released on the band's second album (What's the Story) Morning Glory? in September 1995. It was given an Australian-only single release and was also a radio single in the United States. ==Charts== Chart (1995) Peak position Australia ARIA Singles Chart 25 U.S. Billboard Modern Rock Tracks 24 ==Notes== Category:1995 songs Category:Oasis (band) songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Morning Glory (Oasis song)
